actions.committee: Committee on Labor and Human Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Labor and Human Resources.

actions.in_committee: Committee on Labor and Human Resources
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Aging, Family and Human Services.

actions.in_committee: Committee on Labor and Human Resources
actions.text: Committee on Labor and Human Resources requested executive comment from Health and Human Services Department; GAO; OMB.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Aging, Family, and Human Services

official_title: A bill to require parental notification by any federally funded entity providing contraceptive device or abortion service to an unmarried minor.
subjects: Abortion, Birth Control, and Family Planning

summary.text: Requires the notification of parents or guardians before a federally-funded program, project, or entity may provide contraceptive or abortion services to an unmarried minor.

titles.title: A bill to require parental notification by any federally funded entity providing contraceptive device or abortion service to an unmarried minor.
